summary: This bill, the "Collision-Limiting Operational Upgrade for DOD Aircraft Act" (CLOUD Aircraft Act), directs the Secretary of Defense to study the feasibility and cost of equipping all Department of Defense fixed-wing and rotary-wing aircraft operating in highly trafficked domestic airspaces with air-to-air and air-to-ground collision detection systems. The study, conducted in coordination with the Federal Aviation Administration, must be reported to relevant congressional committees within 180 days, including recommendations and a timeline for implementation.
